ValidationRule.description: Users other than System Admins and Integration user are unable to edit the First Name or Last Name fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND(ISCHANGED(FirstName) || ISCHANGED(LastName)), $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator Full' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permissions to change First Name or Last Name.
